purpose: Master index of where all knowledge lives. Use this to quickly find information without searching the entire repo.

session_continuity.description: Files to read at session start (5-min onboarding)

orchestration_baseline.what: 6 handshakes, 10 roles, quality gates, automation core
orchestration_baseline.when_to_read: When unclear about governance process or role responsibilities

pm_checklist.what: PM requirements, status reporting, budget controls

decision_log.what: All significant decisions with context and rationale
decision_log.when_to_read: When questioning 'why did we decide X?'

assumptions.when_to_read: Sprint planning, risk review, before major decisions

idea_brief.what: Core idea, target users, value hypothesis, success criteria
idea_brief.when_to_read: When need to remember 'what are we building and why?'

project_prompt.what: Scope, constraints, deliverables, success metrics, FSA spec
project_prompt.when_to_read: When need full project scope and technical constraints

system_prompt.what: Rules, style, safety requirements for all agents
system_prompt.when_to_read: When uncertain about coding standards, security rules, or process

team_assembly.when_to_read: When need to know who owns what

task_dag.what: All tasks for Phase 0 + Phase 1 with dependencies and handshakes
task_dag.when_to_read: Sprint planning, understanding critical path, checking dependencies

project_state.what: Real-time status of all tasks, team availability, metrics
project_state.when_to_read: Every session start, before status updates

fsa_specification.what: Foundation Sourcing Agent mandate, catalog areas, scorecard
fsa_specification.when_to_read: When FSA needs guidance, or when choosing open-source components

foundation_catalog.what: Catalog of chosen open-source components with versions, CVE status
foundation_catalog.when_to_read: When integrating components, checking for updates, CVE monitoring

artifact_manifest.what: Expected file structure, artifact counts, build artifacts
artifact_manifest.when_to_read: When scaffolding, checking if artifacts are created

main_readme.what: Overview of orchestration framework, projects, how to get started
main_readme.when_to_read: Onboarding new team members, explaining the system to stakeholders

serp_observatory.what: Example project showing how to apply Orchestration Baseline
serp_observatory.when_to_read: When need template for new project

what_are_we_building.answer: Universal builder för VILKEN APP SOM HELST - websites, e-commerce, SaaS, business apps

why_enterprise_not_mvp.answer: Goal is first-in-Sweden with this class; MVP won't differentiate; retrofitting security/multi-tenancy is 10x harder

why_fsa_mandatory.answer: Prevents reinventing wheel; saves 4+ months; ensures quality/security via scorecard

what_is_critical_path.answer: FSA golden bases → Contracts → Codegen → Runner → Tests

how_long_is_phase_0.answer: 2 weeks with 10 parallel agents, 6-8 weeks with 1 agent sequential

what_connectors_v1.answer: 8 Swedish/EU: BankID, Fortnox, Visma, Swish, Klarna, Stripe, e-sign, email/SMS

what_is_handshake_protocol.answer: PLAN → SPEC → DRAFT → REVIEW → COMMIT → RELEASE (6 stages)

update_frequently: orchestration/assumptions.md (immediately when assumption made or verified)

search_strategies.find_a_decision: Search orchestration/decision_log.md for keywords or DEC-XXX ID
search_strategies.find_an_assumption: Search orchestration/assumptions.md for keywords or ASS-XXX ID

anti_patterns.dont_search_git_history: Use decision_log.md instead - git history is noisy
anti_patterns.dont_guess_task_status: Always check project_state.json - it's source of truth
anti_patterns.dont_skip_session_handoff: Reading session_handoff.json saves hours of context rebuild
anti_patterns.dont_forget_to_log_decisions: Future PM will curse you if decisions aren't logged
anti_patterns.dont_make_assumptions_without_logging: Unlogged assumptions = guaranteed to bite later
